classification.notes: SS-31 (elamipretide) is a mitochondria-targeting peptide studied clinically for mitochondrial dysfunction-related conditions.

status.human_use_note: Prescription drug in certain jurisdictions; this app provides educational information only.

risk.rationale: Human clinical exposure exists; risks depend on indication, dosing, and patient factors.

overview.text: SS-31 (elamipretide) is a mitochondria-targeting peptide that binds cardiolipin and is studied for improving mitochondrial function. This is an educational summary; see evidence links.
